
## @{top_method}:@{partition_method}

```{r}
res = get_single_run(res_list, top_method = "@{top_method}", partition_method = "@{partition_method}")
res
```

Collect all plots

```{r, fig.width = 14, fig.height = 14*4/5, results = "hide"}

```

plots:

```{r, results = "hide", fig.width = 10}

```

```{r}
get_best_k(res)
consensus_heatmap(res, k = 4)
membership_heatmap(res, k = 4)

```

```{r}
get_class(res, k = 4)
```

```{r}

```

Consistency of classes.

```{r}

```
